title: A gill sans lookalike... whats is it?
content:
Can anyone identify the headline font used in black and red on the left hand side of this site?  
 [http://www.wefolk.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20110508164106/http:/www.wefolk.com/ "http://www.wefolk.com/")  
I thought it might have been English Grotesque from Device fonts but alas not. Nor is it Gill but it feels close to both of these.  
Any help appreciated, thanks
author: Arran

comments.content: That’s what I figured. But ‘C’ and ‘G’ haven’t vertical terminals like in Underground.
Jan, yeah that is correct. New Johnston is a bit closer but don't have that gotham like C and G also

Thanks for that guys, i see what you mean about the terminals on the c and g. Its pretty close otherwise though.  
Thanks
